perturbation.original_text: ANTHEMIC shall provide to Sponsor space for a VNUE activation on the 3rd Floor at Virgin Hotel (the "Sponsor area"). This space will be roughly 10 feet by 10 feet (100 square feet).
perturbation.changed_text: ANTHEMIC will attempt to provide space for a VNUE activation on the 3rd Floor at Virgin Hotel (the "Sponsor area"). The provided space is expected to be in the neighborhood of 10 feet by 10 feet (100 square feet).
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall provide' to 'will attempt to provide' makes the obligation to provide space uncertain. Replacing 'will be' with 'is expected to be' introduces ambiguity regarding the size of the space, which may not meet the Sponsor's needs, potentially leading to a breach of contract. This contradicts general contract law principles requiring clarity and certainty in agreements.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Requirement for Certainty and Definiteness

perturbation.original_text: Sponsor shall receive access to the On-Site Event Dates location for onsite distribution of Company approved marketing materials. Specific amount of said materials To Be Determined, after being mutually agreed upon by both ANTHEMIC and VNUE.
perturbation.changed_text: Sponsor will receive access to the On-Site Event Dates location for distribution of marketing materials, quantity to be determined if time permits by both ANTHEMIC and VNUE.
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'if time permits' makes the agreement on the specific amount of marketing materials discretionary, potentially depriving the Sponsor of a key promotional opportunity. This contradicts the intended purpose of the sponsorship agreement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Duty of Good Faith and Fair Dealing

perturbation.original_text: ANTHEMIC and/ or FLOOD Magazine agree to introduce key VNUE personnel/ staff to key VIRGIN HOTEL CHICAGO personnel/ staff, upon receipt of final payment, on or before July 15, 2015.
perturbation.changed_text: ANTHEMIC and/ or FLOOD Magazine should consider introducing key VNUE personnel/ staff to key VIRGIN HOTEL CHICAGO personnel/ staff, upon receipt of final payment, on or before July 15, 2015.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'agree to introduce' with 'should consider introducing' weakens the commitment to make introductions. This introduces ambiguity about whether ANTHEMIC or Flood Magazine is actually required to fulfill this obligation, and under what circumstances they might choose not to. This contradicts principles of contract law, where the obligations of the parties should be clearly defined.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Requirement for Clarity and Definiteness
